title: Ghouliana Stories' The Gift
description: Edited by Vincent D. Hammer & Vivien A. HammerBook #2 in the "Ghouliana Stories' Not Too Scary Tales" series.Join Weezil the Zombie, Galileo the Bat, the Terrible Trio and other Sloggy Bog friends as they discover small acts of kindness or spite can have big consequences.Written with young advanced readers (age 7+) in mind, this children's fantasy novel will delight readers and listeners of all ages.(219 pages)An excellent read-aloud book.
author: Bess Sturgis
